attributes.action: Amalgamate all E Petitions relating to Re-nationalisation of the utility companies and consolidate the posters in favour of such
attributes.additional_details:
The support for the Re Nationalisation is being split between many differently worded petitions which all have the same theme.
This is reducing the support for any one of those petitions and I propose that they all be placed under one single "Re-Nationalise Utilities" petition.
